content: norwegian star earflap hat by tiennie size child adult my son is modeling a child 17 1/2 norwegian star chart hat and an adult 20 1/3 hat materials cascade 220 in 2 colors less than 1/2 skein of main color and less than 1/4 skein of contrast color 1 us #7 16 and/or 32 circular needle adjust needle size if necessary to obtain preferred gauge and 1 extra us #7 needles i knit in the round using the magic loop method but any method you prefer would certainly work - dpns can be used as well as 2 circular needles 1 stitch marker 1 tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge 5 5 sts = 1 in st st should yield a 17 5 hat circumference for a child and 20 1/3 hat for an adult 5 sts = 1 in st st should yield a 19 hat circumference for a child and 22 1/2 hat for an adult 4 5 sts = 1 in st st should yield a 21 1/3 hat circumference for a child and 24 3/4 hat for an adult when i knit hats i can usually adjust a pattern to go up and down in size by changing my needle sizes so experiment with gauge/needles until you achieve the size you d like pattern notes i worked the 1st earflap back and forth on the extra needles when the first one is done i leave it on those needles and worked the second earflap on the 16 circular needles when the second one is done i casted on stitches for the front of the hat using the backward loop method transfer the 1st earflap onto the 16 circular needles by knitting the earflap onto it then i cast on stitches for the back of the hat and then join for knitting the hat in the round abbreviations co - cast on bobble - bind off sts - stitches k - knit p - purl k2tog - knit 2 together ws - wrong side rs - right side pm - place marker m1r - with left needle lift loop between stitches by moving needle tip from back to front and knit into the front of loop to make a stitch that slants to the right m1l - with left needle lift loop between stitches by moving needle tip from front to back and knit into the back of loop to make a stitch that slants to the left page 1 of 2 norwegian star earflap hat by tiennie earflaps using us #7 needles co 5 sts use one set of needles for 1st earflap use second set of needles for 2nd earflap each row begins and ends with k2 for garter stitch edges row 1 ws k2 p1 k2 turn = 5 sts row 11 ws k2 p11 k2 = 15 sts row 2 rs k2 m1r k1 m1l k2 = 7 sts row 12 rs k2 m1r k11 m1l k2 = 17 sts row 3
